publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-4063 Mr Jack McConnell: Presiding Officer-That the Parliament expresses its gratitude to Sir David Steel for his service to the Parliament and recognises the important and historic role he has carried out as its first Presiding Officer. Supported by: Mr John Swinney*, David McLetchie*, Mr Jim Wallace*
S1M-4063 Presiding Officer (lodged on 25 March 2003) Mrs Margaret Smith*
